name: 20"x20" Hand Appliquéd Antlers RED
description: From the hunting lodge to the eclectic city home, this cushion is sure to become a trophy within your space. Strong enough to make a statement alone or as a pair! Made of only the finest materials, as outlined in our Quality Section, each cushion features: * hand printed antlers * appliquéd faux leather plaque * contrast faux leather piping * cotton lining * overlocked seams * invisible zipper * 20"x20" FEATHER INSERT Contents: Front: 100% Natural Cotton Base Cloth Back: 100% Wool Suiting Pinstripe Lining: 100% Cotton Broadcloth Measurements: 20"W x 20"H Cleaning Instructions: To maintain the beauty of your cushion, dry cleaning by a leather specialist is recommended. Please note: Due to the fact that each item is one-of-a-kind, each cushion may have slight variations due to the handmade process.
